parameters.name: FilletType
parameters.description: Simple fillet type as defined in swSimpleFilletType_e

title: ISimpleFilletFeatureData2.Initialize
description: Initializes this simple fillet feature to the specified type.

parameters.name: FilletType
parameters.description: Simple fillet type as defined in swSimpleFilletType_e

returns: True if the simple fillet feature is initialized, false if not
remarks:
After you initialize this data object with a fillet type, you need to narrow the fillet type by specifying
ISimpleFilletFeatureData2::ConicTypeForCrossSectionProfile
.
